title: Open Savings Account
text: Open a savings account at the local bank on Monday.

title: Leg Day
text: Tuesday is leg day at the gym. Try not to forget.

title: Send Marketing email
text: Send the marketing email for the promotion on Wednesday.

title: Haircut
text: Haircut appointment at the barbershop with Chuck at 1:30pm on Thursday.

title: Swimming Lesson
text: Swimming lesson has been moved to Friday.

title: Jump the Shark
text: Happy Days has jumped the shark
